sprf.special.parameter.name: Name
sprf.format.table.title: Html Table
sprf.format.table.description: Convert the result of a sparql query to an html table
sprf.format.csv.title: CSV
sprf.format.csv.description: Produce a link to download the result of a sparql query as csv file
sprf.format.graph.title: Node Graph
sprf.format.graph.description: Convert the result of a sparql query to a connected graph
sprf.format.barchart.title: Bar Chart
sprf.format.barchart.description: Convert the result of a sparql query to a barchart
sprf.format.piechart.title: Pie Chart
sprf.format.piechart.description: Convert the result of a sparql query to a piechart
sprf.format.piechart.query.structure:
The query must adjust to the following rules:
  • The first column in select list represent each slice of the pie.
  • The second column in select list must be composed by numerical values.
sprf.format.donutchart.title: Donut Chart
sprf.format.donutchart.description: Convert the result of a sparql query to a donutchart
sprf.format.bubblechart.title: Bubble Chart
sprf.format.bubblechart.description: Convert the result of a sparql query to a bubblechart
sprf.format.treemap.title: Treemap
sprf.format.treemap.description: Convert the result of a sparql query to a zoomable treemap
sprf.param.divId: Identifier of this element. Must be unique inside the page
sprf.param.sparqlEndpoint: Name of the endpoint to invoke defined in LocalSettings.php
sprf.param.spinnerImagePath: Url of image to show while the query is in execution. If not defined a default text label is shown.
sprf.param.divStyle: css definitions to put inline the container div
sprf.param.cssEvenRowClass: Css class of even <tr> elements of output table
sprf.param.cssOddRowClass: Css class of odd <tr> elements of output table
sprf.param.cssEvenTdClass: Css class of all <td> elements of all even rows of output table
sprf.param.cssOddTdClass: Css class of all <td> elements of all odd rows of output table
sprf.param.noResultMessage: Text message to be shown when the query returns no elements
sprf.param.cssOddTdClass: Css class of all <td> elements of all odd rows of output table
sprf.param.columnConfiguration:
JSON syntax for data presentation. You can specify an array of elements in which every element can define:
  • queryField - name of the column in the sparql query (without ?)
  • label - column header shown in table
  • showLink - true or false if you want every cell of this column have links (or not)
  • cellValuePattern - the pattern to apply to value. You must refer to cell value by using the placeholder {%s}
  • cellLinkPattern - the pattern to generate the link. You must refer to cell value by using the placeholder {%s}
sprf.param.filename: Name of the output csv file
sprf.param.separator: Separator char to be used in csv file
sprf.param.linkButtonCSSClass: if linkButtonLabel is defined you can specify the css class to the <button> element
sprf.param.linkButtonLabel: If defined, the magic word will produce a <button> element with this parameter as label
sprf.param.label: if linkButtonLabel is not defined, the magic word will produce a <a> element with this parameter as label
sprf.param.headerMapping: JSON object to map each column in the sparql query to another label
sprf.param.extraOption: You can specify as many extraOption parameter as you want. Each option must be specified in the following format: propName:propValue.The list of all supported options is listed in the table below.
sprf.param.divCssClass: Css class applied to container div
sprf.param.divCssClassFullScreen: Css class applied to container div in fullscreen mode
sprf.options.chart.title: Title of the chart
sprf.options.chart.series.color: List of colour to use in series
sprf.options.chart.serie.label: Label of the serie
chart.tooltip.label.link.show: true or false to specify if the label in tooltip is linkable
chart.tooltip.label.link.pattern: Pattern to generate the url in label link
chart.tooltip.label.pattern: Pattern applied to label in tooltip
chart.tooltip.value.pattern: Pattern applied to the numeric value in tooltip
sprf.param.seriesConfiguration:
JSON array to configure every series. For each element you can specify:
  • label
  • color
  • assetPattern
  • assetLinkPattern
  • showLink
  • valuePattern
